entry.title: kohunglee/areaEditor: areaEditor.js, a lightweight (<2kb) web-based code editor using JavaScript to enhance <textarea> with smart indentation & bracket pairing for smoother coding. 这是个根据 JavaScript 里几个关于操纵 HTML 原生文本编辑框元素 <textarea> API 而开发的增强版 <textarea> 运行库（迷你版代码编辑器）。它只有不到 2kb 大小，但它能大大增强您在编辑代码时的体验。(MIT License)
entry.content: areaEditor.js, a lightweight (<2kb) web-based code editor using JavaScript to enhance <textarea> with smart indentation & bracket pairing for smoother coding. 这是个根据 JavaScript 里几个关于操纵 HTML 原生文本编辑框元素 <textarea> API 而开发的增强版 <textarea> 运行库（迷你版代码编辑器）。它只有不到 2kb 大小，但它能大大增强您在编辑代码时的体验。(MIT License)

entry.title: w-kuipers/simple-select: A simple to implement, lightweight select component for vanilla JS
entry.content: A simple to implement, lightweight select component for vanilla JS

entry.title: iamVihanga/Ride-Service-Backend: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.
entry.content: A robust and scalable backend for a ride-sharing service built with modern JavaScript technologies. This project leverages the Bun runtime for high performance, the HonoJS framework for lightweight and fast API development, and Drizzle ORM for seamless interaction with a PostgreSQL database.

entry.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
entry.content: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: lurldgbodex/exquisapp-lightweight

sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: realmisky/remind-cli: A lightweight command-line tool to set local desktop reminders easily from your terminal. Schedule notifications with simple time formats like seconds (10s), minutes (5m), or hours (2h)—perfect for quick reminders while you work in the console.
entry.content: A lightweight command-line tool to set local desktop reminders easily from your terminal. Schedule notifications with simple time formats like seconds (10s), minutes (5m), or hours (2h)—perfect for quick reminders while you work in the console.
